title: LF Support Bronze/Silver
body:
Looking for a Support for our team, Truth Gaming Corps.

Must be Bronze or Silver, would prefer it if you lived in Adelaide, South Australia.

I have personally captained a team in seasons 5 that reached Gold IV with 33 wins 0 Losses, but because of the new Dynamic Queue we can no longer play together, so looking to rebuild from scratch!


-Must have good knowledge of bot lane matchups.
-Must have good map awareness.
-Must be able to zone enemies safely.
-Must know when to roam
-Must be proficient on at least 5 different champions.

 -----------------------------

Summoner Name:
Position:
Season 5 Rank:
Current Rank:
Current MMR:
Top Five Champs:
Why do you want to be in a team:

----------------------------------

Please leave these details below.

replies.body:
sharkbate59 
Support
Didnt play ranked s5
B2
1174
Morg,braum,naut,raka,janna
Ive been playing sports my whole life so every game i play is competitive for me. I always look to make the best play possible, i always set things up in advanced. My shot calling is very good but only if the whole team is onboard on certain calls. Lets get to winning:)

Actually ranked 5vs teams are teams of any rank based on the rank of the static group rather then the sum of the whole. So you can still play with people higher ranked in 5vs but not dynamic queue.

Quote of riot: Ranked teams will still be available for players who want to form a team of any skill level, as teams are judged on the skill of the static group rather than the sum total of the individuals.

Summoner Name: **Corruptshun**
Position: **Support** Main
Season 5 Rank: Bronze 1 (Silver 4 by end of preseason)
Current Rank: **Silver 4** 
Current MMR: 1,311 (according to op.gg this is a normal mmr)
Top ~~Five~~ **Seven **Champs: **Braum **(current main), Nautilus, Trundle, Leona, Morgana, Alistair, Thresh
Can also play many others but just less proficient than previous 6
Why do you want to be in a team: Looking to improve my skills beyond solo que, developing in a team will improve communication, shot calling, others calls will help me go in less, extremely aware of how i can improve and want to practice it in a team environment, well aware of roaming, warding and various other macro play, looking for a team that will all buy pinks and ward up as well as me. Watch a lot of pro games, learn a lot that way with champion knowledge, general gameplay and tactics, team compositions and so on, willing to learn from anyone in the team who has advice to give.

i dunno what else to put in this,
add me in game and we can chat further

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Corruptshun
http://www.lol-mmr.com/profilev2.php?summoner=Corruptshun&region=oce
